quest.name: Pickles of Partnership
journal:
Zukin knows the way to a Confederate's heart.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Deliver the Kojin pickles to Confederates at the Coral Banquet.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: The key to a man's heart is through his stomach, Forename. With this in mind, I would ask your help in maintaining an important partnership.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: I have here two pots of our finest pickles, which I would gift to the sentries at the Coral Banquet. Pray see to it they are delivered.

dialogue.name: RIKUFU
dialogue.text: You are far from home, adventurer. What business have you here?

dialogue.name: RIKUFU
dialogue.text: Hah, if it isn't Kojin pickles! I had been looking forward to this! My thanks, friend!

dialogue.name: RIKUFU
dialogue.text: Zukin has been sending us pickles on a regular basis. They bring much welcomed flavor to an otherwise bland day.

dialogue.name: MIDROVER02984
dialogue.text: If you require something, please make it quick. I'm on patrol.

dialogue.name: MIDROVER02984
dialogue.text: Well now, more pickles from the Kojin! There's been more contact between us of late, and I must say I appreciate these little gestures.

dialogue.name: MIDROVER02984
dialogue.text: Please send them my thanks along with this message: should we turn up aught of note, they'll be the first to know.

dialogue.name: MIDROVER02984
dialogue.text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I must be moving along.

dialogue.name: RUGAROVER02984
dialogue.text: You better have a good reason for distractin' me on watch! Might be as I drink hard, but I work hard as well! <hic>

dialogue.name: RUGAROVER02984
dialogue.text: Oh, shite, pickles from the Kojin!? You're a good sort, adventurer! A bloody good sort! <hic>

dialogue.name: RUGAROVER02984
dialogue.text: Let me tell you, these pickles and rice wine are a match made in heaven! Gah, this watch can't end soon enough! <hic>

dialogue.name: RUGAROVER02984
dialogue.text: Oh, I know─I'll move quicker! That way the watch'll end sooner! Haha, what a bloody brilliant idea! <hic>

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Delivered the pickles, have you? Tell me, how did our Confederate friends respond?

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: ...So we continue to be held in good standing. That is well. A little kindness indeed goes a long way.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: In the past, we Kojin would purchase such treasures as the Confederacy seized in lieu of the Ruby Tithe. By maintaining amicable relations, we have first pick of the merchandise. A fine arrangement, I'm sure you'll agree.
